Class EchoController

java.lang.Object
  com.baselogic.demos.remote.EchoController

@Controller
@ManagedResource(objectName="echo:name=EchoController")
@RequestMapping(value="/echo/command")
public class EchoController
extends Object

Handles requests for the application home page. service:jmx:jmxmp://localhost:9875 service:jmx:rmi://localhost/jndi/rmi://localhost:1099/echo
